Data: Toss: Sri Lanka have won the toss and they have opted to bowl first. They are not playing a second spinner, so Dilshan should bowl his quota. Watson says he would have batted anyway. He will continue to bat at No.3. Forrest returns.
Dilshan to Wade, no run bowls it full straightaway and Warner jams it back to the bowler
Dilshan to Wade, no run on the backfoot and punched to short cover
Dilshan to Wade, no run gets forward and defends
Dilshan to Wade, no run comes forward and drives to short cover again
Dilshan to Wade, no run 'bowling' yells Sanga as another ball is defended
Dilshan to Wade, no run bowls it shorter and flatter and he punches it to short cover
Kulasekara to Warner, 1 run quite a bit of movement away from the left hander after pitching, he punches it wide of point
Kulasekara to Wade, no run shorter in length and he fends it off to the leftof first slip, Kapugedera is standing a bit wide
Kulasekara to Wade, no run touch shorter in length again and he punches it to the on side
Kulasekara to Wade, no run Sanga thinks he's nicked it and he throws the ball in the air but the umpire was unmoved! Wade made room and went down the track, no sign of an edge
Kulasekara to Wade, no run this time Wade doesn't offer a shot
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 wide Sanga has done well to stop four certain wides there, too wide down the leg side
Kulasekara to Wade, no run swings it away late and he steers it towards point
Dilshan to Warner, no run gets well forward and jams it back to the bowler
Dilshan to Warner, no run goes back and slaps it straight to cover
Dilshan to Warner, no run gets forward and steers it square of the wicket
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run floated on middle and leg and he clips it towards midwicket
Dilshan to Wade, no run comes forward and pushes it softly towards cover
Dilshan to Wade, 2 runs Wade decides to use his feet and he ends up clipping wide of square leg, had to really force that away, nice tight start by Dilshan
Kulasekara to Warner, FOUR runs Sanga goes back to Kula this time, he overpitches and Warner drives through the line, on the up and wide of mid-off, well timed
Kulasekara to Warner, 1 run drifts on the body and he tucks it wide of midwicket
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run clipped away behind square on the on side for a single
Kulasekara to Warner, no run skids through and hits his thigh as he tries to work it away
Kulasekara to Warner, FOUR runs that's a classic shot! Pitched up and Warner stays at the crease and scoops it through the line and it lands just short of the straight boundary
Kulasekara to Warner, 1 leg bye an appeal for an lbw but it's given as runs, it skidded through and he played it close to the pads and the ball rolled to the off side
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run flighted on middle and clipped to the on side
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run defended towards short midwicket and they take a quick single
Dilshan to Warner, no run gets forward and pushes it down to cover, packed off side field there
Dilshan to Warner, no run defended just wide of the bowler
Dilshan to Warner, no run rocks back and slaps it hard but once again can't get it past the off side field
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run gets forward and clips it wide of square leg
Malinga to Warner, FOUR runs not sure what Warner was trying to do there, he tries to wham it through the on side and ends up getting the inside edge past the stumps, he played it one-handed
Malinga to Warner, no run gets behind the line and defends to the bowler
Malinga to Warner, 2 runs drifts on the body and he clips it wide of midwicket
Malinga to Warner, no run tries to slice it wide of point but Dilshan dives and cuts it off
Malinga to Warner, no run gets behind the line and knocks it down towards mid-off
Malinga to Warner, 1 run makes use of the width and steers it well wide of point
Dilshan to Warner, FOUR runs good shot by Warner! Tossed up and he gets the front leg forward, bends his knee and slogs wide of long-on
Dilshan to Warner, 2 runs gets forward and drives wide of mid-off
Dilshan to Warner, no run
Dilshan to Warner, no run on the front foot and driven down to cover
Dilshan to Warner, no run drops it short and he can't punch it past cover point
Dilshan to Warner, SIX runs Warner gives the charge and scoops it long over extra cover, that's 12 off the over
Malinga to Wade, 1 run drifts on the body and he tucks it to the leg side
Malinga to Warner, 3 runs nicely punched past extra cover and the fielder does brilliantly to pull the ball back near the rope and relay it to Jayawardene
Malinga to Wade, no run gets across and punches it down the track

Malinga to Wade, FOUR runs nicely dabbed away past the keeper, took advantage of the fact that there was no slip, Maharoof does his best to slide and cut it off at third man but there's some doubt if his foot was touching the rope, the third umpire takes a look but it's four
Malinga to Wade, no run tucks him for room and he steers it to the off side
Malinga to Wade, 1 run just opens the face and steers it to square third man
Kulasekara to Wade, 2 runs makes use of the width and steers it past that off side field, well placed
Kulasekara to Wade, no run fullish on middle and leg and he pushes it down the track
Kulasekara to Wade, no run stays back and punches it down towards mid-off
Kulasekara to Wade, no run tucks him up for room and he punches it down towards cover point
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run on the pads and he clips it down towards short fine leg and Malinga fumbles
Kulasekara to Warner, no run drives inside out but can't beat extra cover
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run drifts on the pads and he tucks it to the on side
Maharoof to Warner, no run Warner tries to force it away but maharoof cramps him up for room, clips it to the on side
Maharoof to Warner, 1 leg bye clips it off his thighs to the leg side
Maharoof to Wade, 2 runs continues on the pads and he works it behind square, not the best effort by Malinga
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run this time Malinga runs across and manages to stop it properly
Maharoof to Warner, 1 run bowls it straight again and he works it just wide of mid-on
Dilshan to Warner, 2 runs works it wide of extra cover for a couple
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run drifts on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run gets on his knee and paddles it to the leg side
Dilshan to Warner, no run gives it a bit more air and he squeezes it back to the bowler
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run gets forward and drives through the line down to long-off
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run flatter delivery and he clips it with the turn to the leg side
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run fullish on middle and off and he drives down towards long-on
Maharoof to Warner, no run Warner wanted to force that through the on side but he checked his shot and the ball dropped short of the fielder in the region of wide mid-on
Maharoof to Warner, FOUR runs he really hoicked that across the line and it was always going to test Herath at deep midwicket, all power in that one
Maharoof to Warner, 1 run drifts on the pads and he clips it behind square on the on side
Maharoof to Wade, no run drives on the up but straight towards point
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run Wade gives the charge but he ends up squirting it towards mid-off, challenges the fielder by taking a quick single
Dilshan to Wade, no run makes room and slices it on the up but short of point
Dilshan to Wade, no run comes forward and drives towards cover
Dilshan to Wade, no run drives but can't beat cover point
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run gently eased away to short square leg
Dilshan to Warner, no run checks his drive down to cover
Dilshan to Warner, 1 run the batsman gets well forward and forces it past cover
Maharoof to Warner, 1 run loosener on the off stump and he steers it wide of point
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run steers it down to third man and they jog the single
Maharoof to Warner, 1 run bit of an ugly hoick but he manages to place it wide of square leg
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run comes down the track and he forces it down to long-on, didn't look in control of that one
Maharoof to Warner, no run nicely fielded at short cover and Warner decides against the single

Maharoof to Warner, OUT Sri Lanka will be mighty relieved at that because it's Warner! Things get a little tasty as Maharoof walks past the batsman, Maharoof angles it across the left-hander, the batsman gets a thick outside edge and it's well taken by Sanga falling to his left, Maharoof says something to Warner who
Dilshan to Wade, no run
Dilshan to Wade, no run
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run gets forward and gently tucks it to the on side
Dilshan to Watson, 1 wide that was too wide down the leg side, poor ball
Dilshan to Watson, 1 run pushes it down towards cover point
Dilshan to Wade, no run watchfully leaves it alone to the keeper
Dilshan to Wade, no run squeezes it down towards point
Maharoof to Watson, no run fullish on the off stump and he punches it down towards mid-on
Maharoof to Watson, no run a touch slower and Watson shows the full face and defends towards mid-on
Maharoof to Watson, 1 run cramps him a bit for room but Watson adjusts well by opening the face and dabbing it down to third man
Maharoof to Wade, 2 runs short of a length and he cuts well wide of point and Malinga boots it away at third man, he may not be a 100% yet
Maharoof to Wade, no run gets across and quietly defends down the pitch
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run uses the angle and deftly steers it down to third man
Dilshan to Wade, no run bowls it flatter and Wade rocks back and thumps it to extra cover
Dilshan to Wade, FOUR runs well played by Wade! Bit more flight and Wade gets on his knee quickly and sweeps it hard and wide of square leg
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run clips it down to short fine leg and sets off, the throw was too wide to the keeper
Dilshan to Watson, no run flatter and Watson tries to squeeze that past short third man

Dilshan to Watson, 1 run had to scamper that single there! Clipped to short midwicket and Wade had to rush, the throw from Jayawardene was too high and Sanga did his best to try and back flick that to the stumps but was wide of the woodwork
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run clipped behind square for a single
Maharoof to Wade, no run keeps it on the middle and leg line and he clips it to mid-on
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run gets across and tucks it wide of midwicket for a single
Maharoof to Watson, SIX runs flat and powerful! Vintage Watson as he picks the length early and with great bat speed pulls that flat just over the midwicket rope, Maharoof bowling too short
Maharoof to Watson, 1 run bowls it fuller on the pads and Watson clips it in the air down to Kapugedera at deep midwicket
Maharoof to Wade, 1 run works it through the line down to long-on
Maharoof to Watson, no run slower ball and he quietly pushes it back to the bowler
Kulasekara to Wade, no run fullish on the stumps and squeezed back to the bowler
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run full again and he pushes it past Kula to long-on
Kulasekara to Watson, no run touch short of a length and he punches it back to the bowler
Kulasekara to Watson, 1 run clipped to long-on and that brings up the 100
Kulasekara to Wade, FOUR runs full outside the off stump and he capitalises on the width and squeezes it past cover, nicely timed
Kulasekara to Wade, no run punches it back to the bowler

Malinga to Watson, FOUR runs lazy elegance! Class from Watson as he gets forward and just scoops it over mid-on, at first it looked he was going to spoon it tamely to the fielder but he got a lot more elevation than that
Malinga to Watson, no run tries to slash this through the off side but misses it
Malinga to Watson, 1 run clips it in front of midwicket for a single
Malinga to Wade, 1 run Wade stands in front of the crease, Malinga digs it in a bit shorter and Wade opens the face and dabs it to third man
Malinga to Watson, 2 runs short and wide and Malinga is lucky it didn't go for four, it cost half of that, Watson cuts on the up wide of point and Herath picks up at the deep
Malinga to Watson, no run wide again and Malinga's lucky again, Watson chopped it down to extra cover
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run makes room and cuts it in front of point
Dilshan to Watson, 1 run glides it wide of short third man
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run

Dilshan to Watson, OUT Herath manages to hang on! Dilshan bowls round the wicket and flat, Watson is on his knee and slogs him, the ball travels quickly and flat and Herath runs to his right at deep midwicket, nearly over-runs the ball but manages to hang on on the dive, the ball could easily have bounced off his han
Dilshan to Hussey, no run gets across and shoulders arms
Dilshan to Hussey, no run punches it down towards cover
Kulasekara to Wade, 3 runs Herath is inspired! Clipped towards fine leg and Herath slides and pulls it back before the rope
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run drives inside out towards mid-off and sets off for a quick single
Kulasekara to Wade, no run fuller delivery and once again he defends inside out
Kulasekara to Wade, no run tucks him for room and he punches it towards mid-off
Kulasekara to Wade, no run clips it down to midwicket

Kulasekara to Wade, OUT direct hit and he's gone! Excellent work by Dilshan there, Wade sliced it down towards short point and wasn't sure about the single, Hussey was off the blocks but Dilshan was too quick for him, picks up and throws flat at the stumps in one motion, just short of his ground and the third umpire
Dilshan to Wade, no run gets forward and defends
Dilshan to Wade, no run gets forward and steers it to the off side
Dilshan to Wade, no run driven towards cover
Dilshan to Wade, no run Appeal for a stumping! But he's safe, Wade's beaten on the drive outside the off stump but he ensured his back foot was behind the crease, Asad Rauf calls for assistance
Dilshan to Wade, 1 run stays back and chops it down towards third man
Dilshan to Hussey, 1 run clips it down towards mid-on and it's another decent effort by Dilshan, just 41 off ten overs, job well done
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run Kula gets it to skid through and beats the batsman
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run good length on the stumps and he drives to mid-on
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run gets across and punches it down to mid-off
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 leg bye drifts on the pads and he tucks it towards square leg
Kulasekara to Wade, no run close call for Wade as he gets an inside edge which hits his pads, could so easily have dribbled onto the stumps, too close to cut as well
Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run clips it behind square on the on side for a single

Herath to Wade, OUT can't keep Herath out for too long! Strikes with ball No.1, comes round the wicket, Wade makes room to cut but he ends up getting a thick outside edge, good reflexes nevertheless as he takes it in the second attempt. Good knock by Wade
Herath to Forrest, 1 run comes forward and drives towards cover
Herath to Hussey, no run stays back and defends
Herath to Hussey, no run gets well forward and defends
Herath to Hussey, no run comes well forward and clips it to midwicket
Herath to Hussey, 1 run drives him down to long-off
Malinga to Hussey, 2 runs tucks him up for room and he chops it down to square third man and the batsmen hurry for the second run and the throw was too high

Malinga to Hussey, FOUR runs gives him width and Hussey bends his knee and slices it wide of backward point, Herath runs across from third man and has it covered but fails to pull it back as the ball rolls back to the rope
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run gets on the front foot and drives to mid-off
Malinga to Forrest, no run bowls it straighter and he punches it down the track
Malinga to Forrest, 2 runs tucked away close to the pads towards long leg and the throw to the keeper is too high
Malinga to Forrest, no run angles it across the right-hander and he leaves it alone to the keeper
Herath to Hussey, 1 run
Herath to Forrest, no run stays back and punches it back to the bowler
Herath to Forrest, no run gets forward and drives back to the bowler

Herath to Forrest, OUT Forrest looked quite flummoxed there! Herath got it to grip and Forrest was looking to drive towards mid-off but the ball spun just a bit and hit the off stump, Forrest playing down the wrong line
Herath to Christian, no run comes well forward and defends
Herath to Christian, no run driven firmly back to the bowler
Malinga to Hussey, no run good length on the off stump and he punches it towards point
Malinga to Hussey, no run Hussey nearly chopped that onto his stumps, he expected that to bounce a bit more
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run a bit too straight and he clips him down towards fine leg
Malinga to Christian, no run gets on the backfoot and pushes it towards point
Malinga to Christian, 1 run fullish on the off stump and he drives to sweeper cover
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run gives him width and he slices him wide of point
Herath to Hussey, 1 run floated on middle and off and he drives to the off side
Herath to Christian, no run gets well forward and defends
Herath to Christian, no run defends inside out back to the bowler
Herath to Christian, 1 run forced past the bowler and Malinga does well to slide at mid-on
Herath to Hussey, no run plonks forward and defends
Herath to Hussey, 1 run flighted slowly and the batsman has time to rock back and clip it to the leg side
Maharoof to Hussey, no run slower ball outside the off stump and he steers it softly to the off side
Maharoof to Hussey, 1 run gets an inside edge on the drive to the on side
Maharoof to Christian, no run gets forward and pushes it down towards cover
Maharoof to Christian, no run slower ball and he softly pushes it towards the bowler
Maharoof to Christian, no run gets on the front foot and pushes it back to the bowler
Maharoof to Christian, 2 runs pulls towards deep midwicket for a couple but he doesn't quite time it
Herath to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on the leg stump and he clips it down towards midwicket
Herath to Christian, no run plonks forward and defends
Herath to Christian, 1 run gets well forward and drives to the off side
Herath to Hussey, 1 run tossed up outside off and driven on the up wide of extra cover
Herath to Christian, 1 run gets across and clips it wide of midwicket
Herath to Hussey, 1 run punches it off the front foot down towards cover
Maharoof to Hussey, no run gets on the front foot and drives towards mid-off
Maharoof to Hussey, no run just short of a length and he chops it down towards point
Maharoof to Hussey, 1 run gets across and clips it down to deep midwicket
Maharoof to Christian, no run slower delivery and he gets forward and quietly defends
Maharoof to Christian, 1 run tries to force it away down to fine leg but the ball hurries on him and hits his body

Maharoof to Hussey, OUT hits him a touch high but Asad Rauf's convinced! Maharoof gets it to nip back in off the pitch, the ball skids through and hits his thigh but Rauf was convinced with the height, took a few seconds before raising the finger
Herath to Christian, 1 run gets well forward and tucks it to the on side
Herath to Lee, no run plonks forward and defends
Herath to Lee, no run he's happy to defend this one as well
Herath to Lee, no run defends close to the pads and Sanga's a bit excited
Herath to Lee, no run flatter delivery and defended
Herath to Lee, 1 run bowls it flat again and he defends
Maharoof to Lee, no run gets it to swing in late and he pushes it towards the off side
Maharoof to Lee, no run
Maharoof to Lee, no run gets across and drives him towards mid-off
Maharoof to Lee, no run that sliced him in half and nearly beat the keeper! Gets it to slither inwards off the pitch and beats goes through the gap between bat, pad and sails over the middle stump
Maharoof to Lee, no run
Maharoof to Lee, 1 run swings it back in and he clips it towards square leg
Herath to Lee, 1 run chips down the track and he clips him down towards square leg
Herath to Christian, no run tossed up on the off stump and he defends
Herath to Christian, FOUR runs uses his feet and Christian whips it to the on side but Malinga doesn't get across quick enough to stop it at mid-on
Herath to Christian, FOUR runs Christian chooses to attack, he uses his feet again to a flighted delivery and chips it high over midwicket
Herath to Christian, no run lunges forward and smothers the spin
Herath to Christian, 1 run clips it away down towards midwicket
Maharoof to Christian, no run stays beside the line to point
Maharoof to Christian, 1 run fullish on middle and leg and pushed down to mid-on
Maharoof to Lee, no run gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
Maharoof to Lee, no run slower delivery, Lee gets well forward and has to check his shot
Maharoof to Lee, no run drifts towards the body and he clips him down towards midwicket
Maharoof to Lee, 1 run slower ball outside the off stump and he steers it wide of point
Malinga to Lee, no run good length on middle and off and he defends to the off side
Malinga to Lee, 2 byes another slower ball and the batsman tries to slash it away but misses, beats the keeper as well
Malinga to Lee, 2 runs another slower ball and Lee gets a thick leading edge over extra cover, that travelled quite far
Malinga to Lee, no run makes a bit of room and Lee can only force it down to midwicket
Malinga to Lee, no run another slower ball and Lee makes room and swings but misses
Malinga to Lee, 1 wide loses control of that slower delivery and sprays it wide of the off stump
Malinga to Lee, FOUR runs bowls it short of a length and Lee has a free swing of the arms and pulls wide of midwicket
Maharoof to Christian, 1 run another slower delivery and he clips it off his hips
Maharoof to Lee, 1 run good length outside off and he uses the width to steer it towards third man

Maharoof to Christian, OUT Maharoof strikes again! He continues bowling the slower ball, Christian chips down the track and has to check his shot, ends up spooning it straight to mid-off, Jayawardene takes it
Maharoof to McKay, no run on the off stump and he pushes it back to the bowler
Maharoof to McKay, 1 run swings it towards the pads and he clips it off his pads to square leg
Maharoof to Lee, no run
Herath to McKay, no run
Herath to McKay, 1 run flicks it away down to midwicket
Herath to Lee, no run floated on the pads and he defends to the off side
Herath to Lee, 1 run Lee flicks it down to midwicket
Herath to McKay, no run gets on the front foot and defends
Herath to McKay, 1 run flatter delivery, he flicks it down to midwicket
Malinga to McKay, no run fires the yorker but it's wide of the off stump, he safely leaves it alone
Malinga to McKay, FOUR runs gift for Australia as Malinga misdirects the yorker on the pads and McKay gets some bat on it to send it screeching to fine leg
Malinga to McKay, no run gets forward and pushes it down towards cover
Malinga to McKay, no run keeps a bit low and McKay chops it down towards the keeper
Malinga to McKay, no run
Malinga to McKay, FOUR runs fullish on the off stump and he gets across and lofts it crisply over mid-off, just short of the rope
Kulasekara to Lee, no run starts off with a full one outside the off stump and he drives on the up down towards short cover
Kulasekara to Lee, 1 run stays beside the line and steers it towards the off side
Kulasekara to McKay, no run
Kulasekara to McKay, 1 run stays beside the line and angles it wide of point for a single
Kulasekara to Lee, no run that's a good yorker honing in on the leg stump, Lee makes a bit of room and can only squeeze it back to the bowler
Kulasekara to Lee, no run gets this one to nip back inwards and really squares up the batsman as he tries to cut
Herath to McKay, no run full on the off stump and driven down towards mid-off
Herath to McKay, no run
Herath to McKay, no run gets forward and drives towards mid-on
Herath to McKay, 1 run floated on middle and leg and he tucks him wide of square leg
Herath to Lee, no run chips down the track and checks his shot
Herath to Lee, no run rocks back and chops it down towards point
Kulasekara to McKay, 2 runs goes back at the crease and steers him down to third man
Kulasekara to McKay, no run slower delivery on the blockhole and he digs it out to the bowler
Kulasekara to McKay, no run tries to flick it away but he gets a bottom edge onto the pads
Kulasekara to McKay, SIX runs take that! Pitched up on the pads and McKay takes Kula downtown over deep midwcket! Lovely follow through and it goes about 6 rows back
Kulasekara to McKay, no run on the blockhole outside off and he fails to dig it out
Kulasekara to McKay, 1 run squeezed out to deep cover
Herath to McKay, no run goes back to cut but mis-times it and hits it into the ground near his shoe
Herath to McKay, 1 run chipped in the air but short of the fielder at long-off
Herath to Lee, no run defended back to the bowler
Herath to Lee, 1 run charges the bowler and hits the ball past him towards long off
Herath to McKay, 1 run tries to hit inside out over the off side but gets an inside edge that lobs on the leg
Herath to Lee, 1 run played off the front foot through midwicket
Malinga to Lee, 2 runs fullish in length outside off and he makes room and crashes it to deep extra cover
Malinga to Lee, FOUR runs crashes this one as well off the front foot, Kulasekara dives at the boundary at wide long-off but it was too quick for him, raw power, Malinga not getting the yorker right
Malinga to Lee, no run makes room and swishes at thin air, wide of the off stump
Malinga to Lee, no run gets beside the line and cuts hard but can't beat backward point
Malinga to Lee, 2 runs makes room and crashes it off the front foot but Kulasekara's able to get across and cut it off
Malinga to Lee, no run slower delivery outside off, he swings and misses
Herath to McKay, no run
Herath to McKay, FOUR runs This partnership starting to annoy SL a bit, McKay chips down the track and chips Herath inside out over extra cover, in fact it was more than a chip, clean hit
Herath to McKay, no run drives to the man at cover
Herath to McKay, no run makes room and he gets the ball to drift inwards and he ends up chopping it to the off side

Herath to McKay, OUT McKay perishes trying to go over the top on the on side, he gets on his knee for the slog and he ends up hitting it flat to Maharoof at deep midwicket, he falls forward and takes it
Herath to Lee, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg and he whips it towards midwicket
Malinga to Lee, 2 runs makes room and tries to scoop it over the bowler's head but ends up miscuing it to mid-off
Malinga to Lee, no run slower ball outside the off stump and he misses and Sanga nearly falls over trying to stop it!
Malinga to Lee, 1 run Lee makes room and biffs a full delivery down to long-off, once again Malinga not getting his yorkers through properly, he's not 100% fit they say
Malinga to Doherty, 2 runs opens the face of the bat and steers him down to deep point, a fumble allows a second run
Malinga to Doherty, 1 run runs it down to third man for a single
Malinga to Lee, 1 run Dropped Maharoof thre culprit, the batsman made room and sliced a length delivery down to deep extra cover, it was flat and Maharoof didn't time his dive well
Kulasekara to Lee, no run squeezes out a yorker on the leg stump and Kula runs across and flings it back towards the stumps
Kulasekara to Lee, no run good yorker again, outside the off stump and he makes room and fails to squeeze it out
Kulasekara to Lee, 1 run makes room and squirts out a yorker to deep point
Kulasekara to Doherty, no run on the blockhole angling wide of the left-hander and it's too good for Doherty
Kulasekara to Doherty, 1 run full on the off stump and he squeezes it out to the off side
Kulasekara to Lee, 1 run lofts over mid-off but not timed as well and it's short of the fielder in the deep
Malinga to Lee, 1 run yorker on the pads and he squeezes it out to deep midwicket
Malinga to Doherty, no run another yorker on the pads and he can only squirt it straight to midwicket
Malinga to Doherty, no run squeezes out a yorker to backward point and Dilshan charges at the ball and prevents a single
Malinga to Doherty, no run that's more like it from Malinga, fast yorker outside off and swinging away, can't get bat on ball
Malinga to Doherty, 1 run squeezes out a yorker to Dilshan at backward point and he has a shy at the bowler's end though Malinga wasn't behind the stumps
Malinga to Lee, 1 run swings it to midwicket and risks another single but the throw is wide
Kulasekara to Lee, no run Kula bowls it wide of the off stump on seeing Lee make room, slower ball too, Lee misses
Kulasekara to Lee, OUT knocks off the leg bail! Kula bowls another yorker on the leg stump, Lee makes room to flay that anywhere but the ball hits his boot and shaves the leg stump

Kulasekara to Lyon, OUT not the best start to Lyon's ODI career with the bat! Kulasekara bowls it full on the pads and Lyon makes room and chips it high over midwicket and Senanayake the substitute times the dive well and takes the catch

Still, such is the nature of these teams that even 231 might turn out to be competitive. Don't count Australia out yet. They will come out charging. Whatever it is, we should expect another absorbing chase. Join us in 30 minutes.

There was some debate whether SL gambled by not taking the extra spinner, but Maharoof responded well and justified his inclusion. It could have been a lot worse for Australia, if not for their lower order.

That ends a very satisfying bowling performance by Sri Lanka and let's mention the fielding as well. They made up for their lapses from the second final. There was the odd misfield/drop, but their energy in the field helped them come back after Warner blazed away as usual.
Welcome back. Jayawardene and Dilshan take position. Stage set for an interesting chase no doubt

McKay to Maharoof, 1 run slower ball and a touch short and Maharoof thinks of clubbing it away and ends up flat batting it down the track
McKay to Herath, no run Herath shuffles across his stumps to work that away but the ball clips his pads and dribbles down the track
McKay to Malinga, no run the slower ball and Malinga nearly spoons it to the keeper! We've seen so many slower ones today
McKay to Malinga, 1 run chipped in the air as he tries to work it to the on side, Sri Lanka live to fight another delivery
McKay to Maharoof, 1 run short and pulled and there are two fielders patrolling the deep on the on side to pick that up, Australia really applying the choke
Watson to Maharoof, no run Maharoof takes a bit off his bat, literally! He tries to dig out a full delivery and jams the ball on the pitch, a big chunk off the toe of the bat goes flying
Watson to Maharoof, 1 run makes room to slam that away and he ends up mowing it along the ground to long-on
Watson to Malinga, no run the yorker outside the off stump is too good for Malinga to dig out
Watson to Malinga, 1 run steps down the track and tries to hoick it over the on side and he ends up mistiming it
Watson to Maharoof, 1 run another desperate heave and Maharoof can only just beats the bowler
Watson to Malinga, no run pounced down towards long-on but Maharoof refuses the single
McKay to Maharoof, 1 run Maharoof makes room and slams a length delivery straight to sweeper cover, not much pace on the ball to work with
McKay to Malinga, no run Malinga's chopping wood but making no contact, these slower balls are annoying the batsmen no end
McKay to Malinga, FOUR runs he made contact this time and good one too! Swings this one past square leg and it beats the man in the deep, raw power
McKay to Malinga, no run that slower ball again! Ever considered walking down the track? Swish and yet another miss

There will be an extended presentation today, given it's the final. It's these middling totals that make ODI cricket more watchable. Sri Lanka's resurgence has also made this tournament more watchable, and of course Kohli's blinder, which gave the final league game some context.

McKay's showing has added to the depth to Australia's bowling attack, with Pattinson and Cummins around. In the final analysis, it brings to an end a very rewarding home season after the Ashes drubbing last year.

So Australia go to Windies, Sri Lanka go to Bangladesh. And the rest of us go home. Thanks for joining us today. Sri Lanka, don't despair. You did great getting to the finals despite all the off-field tension about payments. Continue the good work. Cheers!
Australia pose with the trophy. That ends the Australia home season. Will they revert to the tri-series concept? Nobody knows.
Presentation time:
Australia won by 16 runs
Player of the match is Clint McKay, AUS
